title: The All-New AirPort Time Capsule - ME177LL/A and ME182LL/A...
description:
Buy Now - http://www.abt.com/product/70118/Apple-ME182LLA.html
Shop Computer Accessories - http://www.abt.com/category/481/Computer-Accessories.html

With the all-new AirPort Time Capsule backing up your Mac couldn't be simpler. It works with Time Machine in OS X to automatically and wirelessly back up your data to its 2TB or 3TB hard drive1 so you never have to worry about losing anything important. And AirPort Time Capsule doubles as a Wi-Fi base station with next-generation 802.11ac technology for speeds up to 3x faster than the previous 802.11n standard. It's easy to set up and highly secure letting you share your broadband Internet connection a USB printer or a hard drive. And the new vertical design has a smaller footprint so it saves desk space as well as your files.
Key Features:
• Automatic wireless backup with a massive 2TB or 3TB of storage space built right in
• Full-featured Wi-Fi base station with next-generation 802.11ac technology
• Up to 3x faster Wi-Fi
• Up to 50 percent faster Time Machine backups
• Powerful beamforming antenna array for higher performance and range
• All-new design with a smaller footprint
• Simultaneous dual-band Wi-Fi
• Easy setup with a Mac iPad iPhone or iPod touch
• Connect a USB printer or hard drive and access it wirelessly
• Secure connections and compatibility with Mac computers PCs iPhone iPad iPod touch Apple TV and more
